body: Uncensored version for this masterpiece please
What no Fecal play this time. This artist loves shit play eating.

@nipah I know but he only stated about maternity leave. On the childcare part I am unsure on if your are stating your info based on your own country or japan which pretty much all hentai is based on. Since I don't live in jp I can only google info and the info I get is that you are not allowed by default to get over 12 months of child care leave in jp, if you want more you have to be eligible according to the act on childcare leave (jp law) and well I am not gonna study up what those special circumstances are. The parents are eligible for 12 months paid leave total so if both use it at the same time they only get 6 months.
@PussyDestroya with a quick google it's only 6 weeks prior to birth and 8 weeks after birth in Japan sooo...
Wait.... No Maternity leave?... That's illegal....
